body: Mike Stopforth calls on South Africans to honour Nelson Mandela with their actions: "Soon, Nelson Mandela will die. As I write this post traditional and social media channels are rife with rumours of his ill health and deteriorating state."

title: South Africa: Honor Madiba with your actions
